New Notebook

Showcasing Jupyter Notebook Translator Layout

Jupyter Workflows Template

Workflow Overview

graph TB subgraph os.environ["PATH"] += os.pathsep + '/usr/local/texlive/2019/bin/x86_64-darwin' end subgraph to conform with acmart style end subgraph see plt.style.available end subgraph fig.write_image('Heatmap_horizonts_S1.svg') end subgraph fig.update_yaxes(autorange='reversed') end
